original_text: The cherubs looked at each other and they watched over the lid. Their wings touched each other over the top of the lid.
korean_text: 그룹들이 그 날개를 높이 펴서 그 날개로 속죄소를 덮었으며 그 얼굴은 서로 대하여 속죄소를 향하였더라

sentences.original_text: The cherubs looked at each other
and they watched over the lid
over the top of the lid
